S02manivdhu:10: 4 ghṛtagarjakaṃ guḍapūpaṃ sarvasukṛtakāryāṇi yathā lābhaṃ saṃjñātavyaṃ
S02manivdhu:11: 5 maṇḍalakaṃ suracitaṃ kṛtvā tato praveśadvāreṇa gatvodakapūrṇaṃ dvau kalaśausthāpya
S02manivdhu:13: 1 tathā lābhaṃ ca baliṃ sthāpya tathāvat praveśavidhiṃ ca kārayet tataḥ anena mantreṇābhiṣiṃcya
S02manivdhu:14: 2 praveśayet* oṃ maṇi vipula supratiṣṭhita siddha abhiṣiṃca māṃ sarvatathāgatābhiṣekai
S02manivdhu:17: 4 pūrvajanmasaṃjātāni karmāvaraṇāni vuśuddhāni bhavanti bhavanti sarvaśuddhaparigṛhito bhavati :
S02manivdhu:21: yaṃ cintayati yaṃ prārthayati tat tathaiva karoti //
S02manivdhu:37: 5 sukhaṃ sarvatra upayoktavyaḥ yathā upayujyate tathāgatakule //
S02manivdhu:56: oṃ sarvatathāgata samaya maṇi vajre hūṃ hūṃ //
S02manivdhu:58: oṃ sarvatathāgata jaya ajitavajre hūṃ hūṃ //
S02manivdhu:61: 3 mahāmaṇi śikhare hara hara hūṃ hūṃ //
S02manivdhu:63: 4 oṃ sarvatathāgata vajrā hvaya ddhara dhara hūṃ hūṃ phat* //
S02manivdhu:65: 5 oṃ dhuru dhuru maṇi mahāvidyuta maṇi svāhā //
S02manivdhu:76: 3 śaṃkhinī // oṃ āgamaya dhīra mucāṭṭa hāsinī hūṃ dūtīmudrā baddhitavyā : //
S02manivdhu:78: 4 paripūraṇe dhaka dhaka hūṃ hūṃ phat* maṇḍalanivāsinīnāṃ mudrā : //
S02manivdhu:81: oṃ sara sara visara hūṃ hūṃ padmamudrā //
S02manivdhu:86: 2 ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā samantena caturaśrakaṃ poṣadhikena citrakareṇa
S02manivdhu:87: 3 navabhājane na śleṣai raṃgair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrāpayitavyam siṃhāsanasyopariniṣaṇṇaṃ
S02manivdhu:89: 5 dakṣiṇena vajrapāṇiṃ dvādaśabhujaṃ kāryā śaratkāṇḍagaurā nānāpraharaṇahastaṃ caturmukhaṃ saumyaṃ dvitīlavistaraḥ // § //
S02manivdhu:93: 2 keśāpagate ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā samantena caturaśrakaṃ poṣadhikena citrakareṇa
S02manivdhu:94: 3 navabhājanena aśleṣai raṃgair buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrāpayitavyaṃ siṃhāsanasyopariniṣaṇṇaṃ
S02manivdhu:97: 5 dvādaśabhujāṃ kāryā śaratkāṇḍagaurā nānāpraharaṇahastaṃ caturmukhaṃ saumyaṃ / dvitīyaṃ
S02manivdhu:99: 1 raudraṃ tṛtīyaṃ daṃṣṭrākarālaṃ caturthe mukhe bhṛkuṭījaṭāmakuṭāmaṇḍitaṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ
S02manivdhu:104: 4 bāmabāhūṃ padmaddhārayantaḥ dve haste aṃjaliṃ gṛhītavyaṃ : // śeṣaṃ
S02manivdhu:105: 5 prahastaṃ kartavyaṃ tṛśūlaṃ cakraṃ khadgaṃ vajraṃ puṣpapuṭaṃ gaṇendakakaṇḍulaṃ aṣiḥ pu
